mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, NICK, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, UPDATE_DTM ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_BOARD_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{NICK}, 'N', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, CREA_DTM, UPDATE_DTM, NICK, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, CONTENTS = #{CONTENTS}, UPDATE_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
